content: he s ready to melt hearts not snow jack the snowman is here to bring frosty cheer to your winter decor this intermediate pattern features fun accessories like a tiny top hat with a flower and a little broom for sweeping up snowflakes jack is a delightful figure that will be the centerpiece of your handmade holiday display pattern shop › jack the snowman knot-trying-jack-the-snowman-1 jpg knot-trying-jack-the-snowman-2 jpg knot-trying-jack-the-snowman-1 jpg image 1 of 2 knot-trying-jack-the-snowman-2 jpg image 2 of 2 new jack the snowman $0 00 he s ready to melt hearts not snow jack the snowman is here to bring frosty cheer to your winter decor this intermediate pattern features fun accessories like a tiny top hat with a flower and a little broom for sweeping up snowflakes jack is a delightful figure that will be the centerpiece of your handmade holiday display difficulty ➀ ➁ ➌ ➃ ➄ see below for materials and techniques required to complete this pattern add to cart send a tip & become a supporter tip amount add to cart support the release of future free patterns when you tip and subscribe to the knot trying newsletter you ll gain access to early releases and other exclusive content not available to the public learn more about tipping **materials** this pattern uses the following medium weight beginner yarn easy peasy yarn in white black brown yellow gray red pink blue joy tag yarn in caramel brown or baiyou yarn in coffee brown 2 × 10mm safety eyes floral wire optional stuffing 4mm hook scissors darning/tapestry needle **terms & techniques** this pattern uses u s terms and is completed in the round unless otherwise noted rounds r magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase invisible decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain front loop only flo back loop only blo fasten_off invisible fasten_off whip stitch embroidery
